EmailTemplate.name: ATMaas.12-11-20 BNK ATM as a Service Email 5.12-11-20 BNK ATM as a Service Email
EmailTemplate.subject: How ING’s Cashless Branch Strategy Depends on ATMaaS
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Explore How ATM as a Service Frees Your FI to Focus on the Future ${CTAText} <[[${CTAURL}?${url-parameter}]]> It’s a huge decision to give responsibility for one of your most valuable channels to…someone else.
But when your “someone else” has over 50 years’ experience in the self-service channel, over 1,300 patents, an unrivalled global presence and exceptional services expertise—you can rest easy.
That’s exactly what ING Poland did when they switched to NCR ATM as a Service.
Hear why they chose outsourcing, what their model includes, why it’s benefiting them and all the objectives it’s enabling them to meet (like cashless branches), in this video from the recent RBR Branch Transformation conference. ${CTAText2} <[[${CTAURL}?${url-parameter}]]>
